LanguageData.BF_EnergyNeedDesc: Energy is the amount of retained charge in the unit. If it is hits zero, the unit will enter an inefficient low-power mode. If charge is not restored, hardware will eventually critically malfunction, and the unit will cease functioning.
LanguageData.BF_DronesCannotParticipateInRituals: Drones can not participate in rituals.
LanguageData.BF_PrisonerDroneWarning: Drones can not be interacted with. Use surgeries to reprogram (T1 Research required) or shut down.
LanguageData.BF_SlaveDroneAlert: Drones should not be slaves! You are suffering a free error each tick. Immediately reprogram or eliminate this drone.
